statements: SELECT * FROM trading_strategy_performance;
SELECT strategy_name, total_profit, success_rate FROM trading_strategy_performance WHERE total_trades > 100;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM trading_strategy_performance ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM trading_strategy_performance WHERE success_rate >= 70 ORDER BY total_profit DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, total_trades, total_profit, success_rate FROM trading_strategy_performance WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM trading_strategy_performance WHERE total_trades > 100 ORDER BY total_profit DESC, end_date ASC
SELECT strategy_name, total_profit FROM trading_strategy_performance WHERE success_rate > 70 ORDER BY strategy_name
SELECT strategy_id, total_trades, success_rate FROM trading_strategy_performance WHERE total_profit < 5000 GROUP BY strategy_id, total_trades, success_rate
SELECT * FROM trading_strategy_performance WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT AVG(total_profit) AS average_profit, SUM(total_trades) AS total_trades_count FROM trading_strategy_performance
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, performance_metric FROM algo_trading_strategies
SELECT * FROM algo_trading_strategies
SELECT strategy_id, performance_metric, strategy_name FROM algo_trading_strategies WHERE performance_metric > 0.5
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_id, performance_metric FROM algo_trading_strategies ORDER BY strategy_id DESC
SELECT * FROM trading_activity WHERE trade_type = 'Buy'
SELECT * FROM algo_trading_strategies WHERE performance_metric > 0.8;
SELECT strategy_name, performance_metric FROM algo_trading_strategies ORDER BY performance_metric DESC;
SELECT * FROM algo_trading_strategies INNER JOIN trading_activity ON algo_trading_strategies.strategy_id = trading_activity.strategy_id;
SELECT * FROM trading_activity WHERE trade_type = 'BUY' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, AVG(performance_metric) AS avg_performance FROM algo_trading_strategies GROUP BY strategy_name;
SELECT * FROM strategy_performance;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, start_date, end_date FROM strategy_performance;
SELECT strategy_name, start_date, end_date, strategy_id FROM strategy_performance;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM strategy_performance WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, start_date, end_date FROM strategy_performance ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM strategy_performance;
SELECT trade_id, symbol, price FROM trade_execution WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT strategy_id, SUM(gain_loss) AS total_gain_loss FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY strategy_id;
SELECT * FROM trade_execution WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT strategy_id, MAX(win_rate) AS highest_win_rate FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, asset_class FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, asset_class, created_at FROM trading_strategies ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM trades WHERE trade_type = 'Buy' AND trade_qty > 100;
SELECT trade_id, trade_time, trade_qty, trade_price FROM trades WHERE trade_price >= 50.00 ORDER BY trade_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Trend Following';
SELECT trade_id, strategy_id, trade_time FROM trades WHERE trade_qty > 100 AND trade_price < 50;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT log_id, log_entry FROM trade_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trade_id, trade_type, trade_qty, trade_price FROM trades WHERE trade_type IN ('Buy', 'Sell') ORDER BY trade_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Strategy;
SELECT id, name, description FROM Strategy ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT symbol, price FROM MarketData WHERE volume > 1000;
SELECT total_profit, average_profit FROM Performance WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT id, risk_level, risk_date FROM Risk ORDER BY risk_level ASC, risk_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Strategy WHERE id = 10;
SELECT name, description FROM Strategy WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT symbol, quantity, price FROM Trade WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY executed_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT strategy_id, total_profit, total_trades FROM Performance WHERE total_profit > 5000;
SELECT risk_level, risk_description FROM Risk WHERE risk_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
